Crystalberry.name: Crystalberry
Crystalberry.description: Has a cool, sweet taste.  Tastes like winter!
config.GiftTastes.name: Gift Tastes
config.GiftTastes.description: Choose between the NPC gift tastes from the original mod or ones that are more balanced. Default is balanced.
config.EnergyHealth.name: Energy and Health
config.EnergyHealth.description: Choose how much energy and health the berries restore. Default is 100 Energy and 45 Health
